step_data.thought: I've searched for order 000000002 and the results are now displayed on the page. I can see there is one record found in the table with ID '000000002'. To view the details of this order, I need to click on the 'View' link in the 'Action' column of this order. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see the 'View' link at bid 1807.
